thread.title: Fox News pledges full support of Sean Hannity

title: Fox News pledges full support of Sean Hannity
text:
Fox News pledges full support of Sean Hannity Tuesday, April 17, 2018 - 01:45 
Fox News said on Tuesday it was putting its ''full support'' behind television host Sean Hannity after it was revealed that he had an ''informal relationship'' with U.S. President Donald Trump's personal attorney Michael Cohen. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
